#On generating MS instrument queue @ FGCZ
```{r}
library(bfabricShiny)

easylc <- list(name='easylc', clean='F6', standard='F8')
waters <- list(name='waters', clean='1:F,6', standard='1:F,8')
eksigent <- list(name='eksigent', clean='1F06', standard='1F08')

test_data()
```


```{r}
res <- bfabricShiny:::.format_input_data(x=test_data(), multiple = 1, hplc = easylc)
```

# use cases

## use case 1 - default 

```{r}
res.default <- bfabricShiny:::.generate_template_base(res)

bfabricShiny:::.insert_qc_samples(res.default, how.often = 5, how.many = 1, hplc = easylc)
```

## use case 2 - randomized queue
```{r}
res.random <- bfabricShiny:::.generate_template_random(res)
bfabricShiny:::.insert_qc_samples(res.random, how.often = 5, how.many = 1, hplc = easylc)
```

## use case 3 - block randomized queue
```{r}
res.random.block <- bfabricShiny:::.generate_template_random_block(res)
bfabricShiny:::.insert_qc_samples(res.random.block, how.often = 5, how.many = 1, hplc = easylc)
```
